product.name: Pen
product.description: A pen used for writing on paper

components.name: Tip
components.description: Keeps the tip point/ball on its place and keep the pressure on the pen

components.name: Barrel
components.description: Keeps all the components on 1 place

components.name: Barrel on the Back
components.description: Keeps all the components on 1 place, and has teeths inside to slide components under pressure in a other horizontal movement

components.name: Spring on the tip
components.description: Metal compression spring for energy storage, designed to facilitate the click mechanism of a ballpen by providing consistent force and immediate return to its original state after compression. This component is crucial for the pen's reliability and longevity, ensuring smooth and seamless operation.

components.name: Ink Chamber
components.description: Refillable cartridge for a ballpoint pen, contains ink

components.name: Ballpoint Tip
components.description: Steel ball used to roll ink onto the paper

components.name: Thrust Spacer
components.description: The thrust spacer is a small component situated near the tip of a ballpoint pen. Its primary function is to maintain the optimal position of the ball in the tip, ensuring smooth rolling action and consistent ink flow. It is designed to withstand the pressure exerted during writing, preventing ink leakage and maintaining the integrity of the pen's point.

components.name: Push Button Mechanism
components.description: The push button mechanism is a crucial component of retractable ballpoint pens, responsible for controlling the extension and retraction of the pen tip. It allows the user to expose the tip for writing or to retract it for safe storage. This mechanism typically consists of a push button, a spring, and a locking system to maintain the desired position of the tip.

components.name: Trust device Spring
components.description: The trustdevice spring is an integral component of retractable pens that provides the necessary tension for the pen's click action. It works in tandem with the push button mechanism to extend and retract the pen tip smoothly and ensures that the pen tip is securely locked in place when not in use.

components.name: Pen button
components.description: Button to press the pen refillment outside and make it possible to make a horizontal movement on the truster

components.name: Pen holder
components.description: Holder to be able to hang the pen on somthing like a blouse
